title: Create GitHub org and repo
description: Create github.com/agentlog org and agentlog/agentlog repo. Set up basic repo structure.

title: Fix epic dependency direction: use parent-child type
description:
Currently epic agentlog-nuz has 19 dependencies with type 'blocks' pointing FROM epic TO children. This is semantically backwards for parent-child relationships.

The correct model: each child should have a dependency pointing TO the epic with type 'parent-child'.

Fix:
1. Remove existing blocks deps from epic
2. Add parent-child deps from each child to epic:
   bd dep add <child-id> agentlog-nuz --type parent-child

This will make bd epic status work correctly and fix the beads-ui epics view.
close_reason: Fixed: converted 19 blocks deps to parent-child type. bd epic status now works correctly.

title: agentlog init should actually install snippets
description: Current behavior: init prints snippets to stdout, user must manually copy/paste. Better behavior: init --install actually writes files to detected locations (app/controllers/, config/routes.rb, config/initializers/, app/javascript/). Should detect existing files and merge/append appropriately. Print what was done, not what user should do.

title: Improve agentlog discoverability for agents
description: Agents don't know what agentlog is. Options: (1) Better --ai-help output with full description, (2) Add agentlog to agent context via SessionStart hook, (3) Create docs that agents can find. The tool should be self-describing enough that 'agentlog --ai-help' tells an agent everything it needs.

title: Dogfood: Add agentlog error logging to agentlog CLI
description: Use the Go snippet to log errors from agentlog itself. Add error capture in cmd handlers for CLI errors, invalid inputs, file parsing failures. True dogfooding - agentlog logs its own errors.

comments.author: dylanconlin
comments.text: Phase: Design complete - Created docs/designs/2025-12-10-init-command.md. Approach: Stack detection via marker files (package.json→TS, go.mod→Go, etc.), create .agentlog/ dir, add errors.jsonl to gitignore, print copy-paste snippet. Moving to TDD implementation.

comments.author: dylanconlin
comments.text: Phase: Complete - Implemented init command with stack detection (TypeScript/Go/Python/Rust), directory setup, gitignore management, and language-specific snippets. All tests pass. Files: internal/cmd/init.go, internal/detect/stack.go, docs/designs/2025-12-10-init-command.md
